import { Fragment } from "react"; import { Popover, Transition } from "@headlessui/react"; import { AnnotationIcon, ChatAlt2Icon, InboxIcon, MenuIcon, QuestionMarkCircleIcon, XIcon, } from "@heroicons/react/outline"; import { ChevronDownIcon } from "@heroicons/react/solid"; import heroImage from "../../src/assets/images/header_image.jpg"; const solutions = [ { name: "Joel Carlsson", description: "Get a better understanding of where your traffic is coming from.", href: "#", icon: InboxIcon, }, { name: "David Sturesson", description: "Speak directly to your customers in a more meaningful way.", href: "#", icon: AnnotationIcon, }, { name: "Carl Ejnarsson", description: "Your customers' data will be safe and secure.", href: "#", icon: ChatAlt2Icon, }, { name: "Marcus Thuresson", description: "Connect with third-party tools that you're already using.", href: "#", icon: QuestionMarkCircleIcon, }, { name: "Karl Erelöf ", description: "Connect with third-party tools that you're already using.", href: "#", icon: QuestionMarkCircleIcon, }, ]; const navigation = [ { name: "Om oss", href: "#" }, { name: "Projekt", href: "#" }, { name: "Kontakt", href: "#" }, ]; function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(" "); } /* DROPDOWN-CODE {/* {/* Solutions */ /* */ export default function HeroSection() { return (
